sentences.en: " I just can't help being a bIt'superstitious, Yun - ching : I'm fated to be unlucky this year.
sentences.cn: “ 喂,老冯,今儿我也忍不住要说句迷信话: 流年不利.

sentences.en: But poor ill - fated little cousin , losing your mother so young!
sentences.cn: 只可怜我这妹妹这样命苦,怎么姑妈偏就去世了!

sentences.en: But why was he fated to get such a dirty deal?
sentences.cn: 而究竟为了什么他应该活受罪呀!

sentences.en: England's footballers are back home after their ill-fated trip to Algeria.
sentences.cn: 英格兰足球队结束了倒霉的阿尔及利亚之行，回到了国内。

sentences.en: He was fated not to score.
He was fated to miss many opportunities to succedd.
sentences.cn: 他注定会失去许多成功的机会.

sentences.en: It came on the heels of our ill - fated venture into deep - sea diving.
sentences.cn: 我们刚去过深海潜水探险结果失败了.

sentences.en: It was fated that we should fail.
She was more or less fated to remain with her parents.
sentences.cn: 她在某种程度上注定要与她的父母待在一起.

sentences.en: The ill fated ship was sent off course into shallow waters and rammed by another vessel.
sentences.cn: 这艘倒霉的船偏离航道误入浅水区，被另外一艘船撞上了。

sentences.en: The word " necessitated, " however, suggests that choices are fated and uncontrollable.
sentences.cn: 但 “ 必然会 ” 一词表示, 各项选择是注定的、无法控制的.

sentences.en: Was Othello fated to kill Desdemona, or did lago create the circumstance?
sentences.cn: 奥赛罗注定要杀死苔丝狄蒙娜 吗 ?还是拉戈创造了环境?

sentences.en: We were fated never to meet again.
sentences.cn: 我们注定了永远不能再相见。

sentences.en: You may be fated to have a very influential incarnation.
sentences.cn: 你可能注定是一种非常有权势的化身.

words.tran_cn: 致命的；重大的；毁灭性的；命中注定的
重大的；决定性的；宿命的
致命地；命中注定地；不可避免地
死亡；宿命；致命性；不幸；灾祸

trans.tran_cn: 命运已定的，宿命的，受命运支配的
trans.tran_en: certain to happen or to do something because a mysterious force is controlling events
